title: VTU_ 06-07-1992.pdf
description:
June/July 1992 issue of Video Toaster User Magazine. I have about 3 years worth and will scan and post them in chronological order (thats the order that they were published for you who have problems reading big words)

This is a PDF file and contains all articles, reviews and tutorials. Full page advertisements have been left out to save time and space (This particular issue was about 1/3 ads).

The tutorials may be somewhat dated, but most are still useful for an introduction to using Lightwave. If anyone is in need of a particular issue, I will on request, get it done as soon as possible.

Please Seed, and leave comments if you find this torrent useful.

--
Hieraco
